message.name: ERR_PRODUCTEVIDENCEFORMLINK_XRV_EVIDFORM_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start and End dates should be later than Evidence Form's start date "%1s".

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTEVIDENCEFORMLINK_XRV_EVIDFORM_DATE_RANGE
message.locale: Start and End dates should be within the Evidence Form's start date "%1s" and end date "%2s".

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTEVIDENCEFORMLINK_XRV_EXISTING_EVIDFORM
message.locale: An evidence form with the same or overlapping date periods already exists for this product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTEVIDENCEFORMLINK_FV_EVIDFORM_EMPTY
message.locale: Select evidence form for this product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTEVIDENCEFORMLINK_FV_ENDDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: End date must not be empty. Start and End dates should be within the Evidence Form's start date "%1s" and end date "%2s".
